name: signia-react
description: Tiny little react bindings for signia.
author: tldraw GB Ltd.
/* NOTE */: These `main` and `types` fields are rewritten by the build script. They are not the actual values we publish

scripts.build-docs: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out docs src/index.ts --excludePrivate --excludeInternal --readme none  --githubPages false --entryDocument index.md
